questions is bariatric surgery painful and comparision other operations honestly it's not nearly as painful as some other things that you may have heard of because of laparoscopic surgery
and the small incisions we have you up moving right away after surgery and most patients don't even take narcotic pain medication what are the risks of bariatric surgery actually the risks are
very low the risks of bariatric surgery are in general the risks of general surgery which are things like bleeding infection blood clots or pneumonia and all are less than 1% patients will ask
water what is my recovery and the recovery is very quick after about two hours of surgery you'll be up walking about four hours after surgery you're in the hospital for two days and you'll be
back doing cardio when you get home we always get asked what happens to any loose skin after bariatric surgery and the answer is that we have partners of Plastic Surgery who are professionals at
handling this once you lose your weight and get down to near your ideal body weight will refer you to a plastic surgeon who will work on body contouring you may wonder what will happen to my

on its own it requires a significant lifestyle change in terms of diet and exercise you'll find that over the next several months after bariatric surgery or weight loss will be astounding and
over the next several years you'll look in the mirror and find a new person staring back at you you may wonder what kind of improvements are fine after I have weight-loss

in their health what you'll see is a more healthy more effective you you will be more mobile you won't have to go to the doctor as much you'll have far less medications to take your diet will be
more rewarding and the time that you spend with your family which by the way will be longer will be much more rewarding so this represents a massive lifestyle change everyone wants to know
how quickly I'll lose weight after surgery the answer is it's different for everyone but on average you lose about five to seven pounds per week who will pay for my surgery and the answer is in
